entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy this evening and ending after midnight then clearing. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
